lead_paragraph: Two of the most controversial decisions of the 2009 season occurred in the same stadium, Lucas Oil Field in Indianapolis.
snippet: Bill Belichick and Bill Polian think they know more about football than you do. With their track records, do they deserve the benefit of the doubt?

headline.main: Pats and Colts Don't Care What You Think

abstract: Bill Belichick and Bill Polian think they know more about football than you do. With their track records, do they deserve the benefit of the doubt?
